description:
Universe Shield is an application of the decentralization chain of goods guarantee based on blockchain technology, our objection is to provide centralization and open records for all things in the world, and build the world's first "medical insurance" for goods.

Universe Shield is based on the advantages of the intelligent contract and the non tamperable whole record of the blockchain technology, which greatly improves the efficiency of the implementation of the guarantee contract, and avoids many problems, such as repeated claims and malicious claims. The guarantee contract and maintenance results are recorded in the blockchain, and can not be tampered with so that all interactive records after disputes can be tracked and located.
name: Universal Shield Token
